Flow.description:
Flow Run as User or System Context Fix Bug get URA
14 July 2025 1. Call API to check RO Customer Status

formulas.name: funcS_CustomerStatus
formulas.expression: IF({!varS_CustomerStatus} == "New", "New", IF({!varS_CustomerStatus} == "RO PBF", "RO PBF", IF({!varS_CustomerStatus} == "RO Non PBF (Other Product)", "RO Non PBF (Other Product)", "New")))

formulas.name: funcS_GetAssetLatitude
funcS_GetAssetLongitude
formulas.expression: IF( AND( FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value}) > 0, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) > 0, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) + 1) > 0 ), IF( ISNUMBER( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) + 1, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), VALUE( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) + 1, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), 0 ), 0 )

formulas.name: validate_NOP_Min3Digits
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Nomor_Objek_Pajak}), LEN({!Nomor_Objek_Pajak}) >= 3), '', '- Please enter at least 3 digit number')

formulas.name: validate_SertifikatNumber_Min3Digits
formulas.expression: IF(OR(ISBLANK({!Sertipikat_Number}), LEN({!Sertipikat_Number}) >= 3), '', '- Please enter at least 3 digit number')

Flow.label: [Scr] Edit Opty

fields.name: lblConfirm
fields.fieldText:
Pemberitahuan


Apakah Anda yakin ingin menyimpan loan information ini?

Pastikan informasi yang Anda input benar dan sesuai.

fields.name: lblWarning
fields.fieldText: Mohon maaf anda hanya dapat membuat Loan dari dalam Lead

fields.name: lblInfo
fields.fieldText:
* = Required Information


{!varS_ErrorMsg}

fields.name: lblDebug
fields.fieldText:
IS EDIT = {!funcB_IsEditing}

IS NEW = {!funcB_IsNew}

textTemplates.name: tpl_AssetCityKabupaten
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name, code__c from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!Asset_Provinces.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_AssetKecamatan
textTemplates.text: select Id,Name,code__c from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!funcS_AssetKabupaten}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_AssetKelurahan
textTemplates.text: select Id, name, code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!funcS_AssetKecamatan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_AssetZipCode
textTemplates.text: select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!funcS_AssetKelurahan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_ProductOffering
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, text_package_id__c from Product_Offering__c where Product_Type__c = '{!Product_Type}'
